title: Name the game that's dragged you away from LOL for the longest period of time?
body: For me it was The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, i didn't play any league for about 6 weeks.

replies.body: The graphics are legendary but the story line and gameplay are terrible.

What a game that one is, some people say it is terrible but I like to call it challenging

Btw I saw the opl, there is always next year I guess :'(
Neverwinter when I was grinding hard to lvl 70
other... other games? *glances at lol client* blasphemy....
Badminton, went oversees for a competitive tourney and stayed there for a year ...

League of Legends. I just get sick of the people in the game i get sick of the game but i love this game. and will just refuse to play it for awhile if i feel i am not doing well in game or am just getting lots of really toxic people in every game i play.

ff14
I've had it for a month and I've been putting in 4-5 hours of gameplay on it most days. I've had too many late nights because of it.
That's a tough one. It would either be GTA V (I *really* like heists) or Reactor Incremental (f*cking in-browser idle games).
